definition: A process of setting up or putting in place a system, equipment, or machinery, often involving the assembly, connection, and configuration of various components. It is commonly used in the context of implementing or establishing a complex structure or system, such as technological installations, software installations, or the installation of physical infrastructure.

examples.german: Die Installation der Software dauerte mehrere Stunden.
examples.english: The installation of the software took several hours.

examples.german: Die Installation des neuen Heizsystems wurde abgeschlossen.
examples.english: The installation of the new heating system was completed.

examples.german: Die Installation der neuen App war sehr einfach.
examples.english: The installation of the new app was very easy.

examples.german: Die Installation der Sicherheitskameras erfolgte gestern.
examples.english: The installation of the security cameras took place yesterday.

examples.german: Die Installation der neuen MÃ¶bel wird morgen stattfinden.
examples.english: The installation of the new furniture will take place tomorrow.
